item.title: How do i make a new aera for admins?
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“oldschoolscape, post:7, topic:262893”]copy and paste this into your client.java.

if (command.startsWith(“staffzone”) && playerRights > 0) {
toX = 2794;
toY = 3322;
heightLevel = 0;
sM(“Welcome to the staff island!”);
sM(“Relax with fellow staff and sort players problems out from a distance.”);
}

keep those coors in they take you too an island, if you dont want that island change them too where you want it too be. do this by finding your place and doing ::mypos. note your coords down and edit them into this code.[/quote]

next time use code tags.
2. why would he want a command for normal player+
3. we dont even know if hes using delta.
4. when you are using a command for normal players+ you do not need the playerrights also.

the tele coords you offered him is a really tiny island. no one would use that for mod/admin zone.

red, what source are you using??

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new aera for admins?

item.title: How do i make a new aera for admins?
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

copy and paste this into your client.java.

if (command.startsWith(“staffzone”) && playerRights > 0) {
toX = 2794;
toY = 3322;
heightLevel = 0;
sM(“Welcome to the staff island!”);
sM(“Relax with fellow staff and sort players problems out from a distance.”);
}

keep those coors in they take you too an island, if you dont want that island change them too where you want it too be. do this by finding your place and doing ::mypos. note your coords down and edit them into this code.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a new aera for admins?

else if (command.startsWith("name of command") && playerRights >= 1) if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by mod luke } else { teleportToX = coords; teleportToY = coords; sendMessage("You teleport to the Mod & Admin Zone."); sendMessage("GREAT JOB YOU FINALLY EARNED MOD or ADMIN!"); }

item.title: How do i make a new aera for admins?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“Robban1, post:2, topic:262893”]I can give you the codes but i can tell you.

First you get the Coords For The Place.

Then You Copy This Code Below: } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("StaffZone")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Owner Robban } else { teleportToX = YOURXCOORDHERE; teleportToY = YOURYCOORDHERE; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Your Are Now At The New Staff Place!!"); }

and paste it at your other commands.

and… thats all.

REMEMBER TO CHANGE THE COORDS TO THAT YOU GOT!

Now pelase press the Repp++ button.[/quote]

He can’t rep, and asking for rep is against the rules.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make a new aera for admins?
item.dc:creator: @Robban1 Robban1
item.description:
@Robban1 wrote:

I can give you the codes but i can tell you.

First you get the Coords For The Place.

Then You Copy This Code Below: } else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("StaffZone")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by Owner Robban } else { teleportToX = YOURXCOORDHERE; teleportToY = YOURYCOORDHERE; heightLevel = 0; sendMessage("Your Are Now At The New Staff Place!!"); }

and paste it at your other commands.

and… thats all.

REMEMBER TO CHANGE THE COORDS TO THAT YOU GOT!

Now pelase press the Repp++ button.
[center] Asking for rep is against the rules[/center]
